metadata.name: Forget Me Not
metadata.description: "Forget Me Not" was conceived during the pandemic when I was at my lowest point mentally and spiritually. This project is dedicated and honors all of our loved ones we have lost from COVID-19. Special thanks to my voice student, Shaniya Perry who partnered with me on the vocals on this track and my mentee, Noah Van Ess who helped build the track. So honored to work with my godson and artist Twinny Twin, on this project after a lifetime of sharing our passion for music with each other. A percentage proceeds from this project will go towards providing scholarships for students who are preparing to audition for arts degrees in college as well as future projects that will continue to allow me to give back to my arts community. I will also be using this project to help promote my next main stage musical, Team M. Team M is a groundbreaking project that will shed light on mental health issues in the Black community. Join me on this journey as I share my passion for music through community outreach and engagement.
